listeningQuestion.question: Why did the writer prefer to stay on the bus?
listeningQuestion.translation: 作者为什么宁愿留在车上？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个有趣的乘车经历。作者在乡间旅行时迷了路，售票员承诺告诉他下车地点，却忘记提醒他下车。当作者发现自己成了车上唯一的乘客时，售票员表示要返回，作者则选择继续留在车上。在语法方面，重点介绍了表示习惯性动作的动词用法，以及一些常见词汇的区别，如lose、loose和miss，以及expect和wait for的区别。文章还涉及了一些重要的词汇用法，如ride、excursion、conductor和view等。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
notes: I love travelling in the country, but I don't like losing my way.
I went on an excursion recently, but my trip took me longer than I expected.
'I'm going to Woodford Green,' I said to the conductor as I got on the bus, 'but I don't know where it is.'
'I'll tell you where to get off.' answered the conductor.
I sat in the front of the bus to get a good view of the countryside.
After some time, the bus stopped.
Looking round, I realized with a shock that I was the only passenger left on the bus.
'You'll have to get off here,' the conductor said. 'This is as far as we go.'
'Is this Woodford Green?' I asked.
'Oh dear,' said the conductor suddenly. 'I forgot to put you off.'
'It doesn't matter,' I said. 'I'll get off here.'
'We're going back now,' said the conductor.
'Well, in that case, I prefer to stay on the bus,' I answered.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 我喜欢在乡间旅行，但却不愿意迷路。
最近我作了一次短途旅行，但这次旅行所花费的时间比我预计的要长。
'我要去伍德福德草地，'我一上车就对售票员说，'但我不知道它在哪儿。'
'我来告诉您在哪儿下车，'售票员回答说。
我坐在汽车的前部，以便饱览农村风光。
过了一些时候，车停了。
我环视了一下身旁，惊奇地发现车里就只剩我一个乘客了。
'您得在这里下车，'售票员说，'我们的车就到此为止了。'
'这里是伍德福德草地吗？'我问道。
'哎呀，'售票员突然说，'我忘了让您下车了。'
'没关系，'我说，'我就在这儿下吧。'
'我们现在要返回去，'售票员说。
'好吧，既然如此，我还是留在车上吧。'我回答说。

notes.title: 表示习惯性动作的动词
content: 表示状态、感觉、情绪、精神活动的动词常用一般现在时而不用于进行时

这类动词包括：appear, appreciate, believe, feel, forget, hear, know, like, look, notice, remember, resemble, see, think, understand, belong to, consist of, contain, desire, detest, dislike, hate, hope, love, matter, mean, mind, need, want, wish
例如：I love travelling in the country.（我喜欢在乡间旅行）

notes.title: 特殊疑问词+to+动词原形
content: 例如：Can you tell me how to get there? = Can you tell me how I can get there?
I don't know which to choose.
I wonder when to have a meeting.

notes.title: as far as + 从句
content: 表示'到……程度/限度，就……的限度而言'
例如：This is as far as we go.（我们就到此为止）
This is as far as I can understand.（我只能理解到这个程度）
This is as far as I can afford.（我只能付这么多钱）

notes.context: 表示在旅行中迷失方向
notes.example: I don't like losing my way.
I went on an excursion recently.
I sat in the front of the bus to get a good view of the countryside.

notes.translation: 如果那样的话，既然是那样
notes.example: Well, in that case, I prefer to stay on the bus.

multipleChoice.question: The trip took him longer than he expected. He didn't expect it to last ___.
multipleChoice.explanation: so long = for a long time，表示'这么长时间'

multipleChoice.question: 'Where ___ get off?' I asked. 'I'll tell you where to get off,' answered the conductor.
multipleChoice.explanation: 在正式英语中，应该用'shall I'，但在日常口语中，'What to do?'这样的表达也很常见

fillInBlanks.sentence: This is as far as we go. We don't go ___.
fillInBlanks.hint: 表示'不再继续'的短语，与'not any more'或'not any longer'意思相近

notes.title: 词汇辨析
notes.content: 本课涉及几组容易混淆的词汇：1) lose（失去，丢失）、loose（松动的）和miss（错过，思念）；2) expect（预计，期盼）和wait for（等待）。expect表示等待时往往侧重人的心理而不是具体在某个地方等，而wait for主要指'等待'这个动作本身。

notes.title: 实用表达
notes.content: 本课中的一些表达方式在日常英语中非常实用，如'lose one's way'（迷路）、'get a good view of'（欣赏美景）等。这些表达不仅用于书面语，在口语交际中也经常使用。
